title: Beads Workflow Integration - Pane-Issue Correlation and Audit Trail
description: Add deep workflow integration between ccmux panes and beads issues, enabling automatic correlation, audit trails, and recovery hints for multi-agent development workflows. This includes pane-issue assignment tracking, auto-injection of pane context into beads operations, issue creation from pane events, recovery/query tools, and orchestration integration.
user_impact: Provides complete audit trail of pane-issue work, easy debugging (what was pane X working on when it crashed), recovery support (restart work on issue Y), and accurate attribution (which pane/session completed each task).
